message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, since I'm the one making the offer.  What do you think?
Your offer wasn't quite fair to me. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  The money will be worth less next round anyway.
Let's call it even. I'm willing to split the money 50/50, given how the value is dropping.  It's the best we can do at this point.
